name: PreviewWebsetQuery
description:
Preview search query decomposition for a webset.

This tool previews how a search query will be decomposed before creating a webset. It shows the detected entity type, generated search criteria, and available enrichment columns. Use this to understand search interpretation before creating a full webset.

parameters.name: search_query_input
parameters.description: JSON object containing the search query and additional parameters for previewing query decomposition.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa_search API.
